quizzes.title: Basic Commands & Numbers
quizzes.description: Learn fundamental Korean commands and counting

questions.question: What does 'Charyot' mean?
questions.explanation: Charyot means 'Attention' - the command to come to attention position.

questions.question: What is the Korean word for 'bow'?
questions.explanation: Kyongye is the formal bow showing respect to instructors and opponents.

questions.question: What number is 'Hana'?
questions.explanation: Hana is the Korean word for the number one.

questions.question: How many movements are in Chon-Ji pattern?
questions.explanation: Chon-Ji has 19 movements, representing heaven and earth.
